derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from causey + way

entry.tran: (穿越水域或湿地的)堤道，砌道
entry.def: A causeway is a raised path or road that crosses water or wet land.

means.word_mean: 1. a road that is raised above water or marshland or sand
2. pave a road with cobblestones or pebbles
